con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../schemas/InventoryRequest.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../schemas/InventoryResponse.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="InMessage"> <wsdl:part name="InMessageRequest" element="InventoryRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="OutMessage"> <wsdl:part name="OutMessageResponse" element="InventoryResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="InventoryInterface"> <wsdl:operation name="processMessage"> <wsdl:input message="InMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="OutMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="InventorySoapHttpBinding" type="InventoryInterface"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <wsdl:operation name="processMessage"> <soap:operation style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="InventoryService"> <wsdl:port name="InventoryEndpoint" binding="InventorySoapHttpBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/server-external-api/services/soap"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RMT2_Message_Header_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="accounting/Accounting_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Web Service Message for managing inventory requests</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="InventoryRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="header" type="header_type" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Known as the Web Service Header. This element is to be used as part of the request data. Contains the data needed to identify and route message to its property service implementation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="criteria" type="inventory_criteria_group" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The inventory selection criteria group</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="profile" type="inventory_detail_group" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The inventory data set group</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="header_type" mixed="false" abstract="false"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="routing" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Represents the destination for this message</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="application" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the application name in which this message is targeted.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="module" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the application module name in which this message is targeted.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transaction" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">This is the application module name in which this message is targeted.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="delivery_mode" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">How MOM is supposed deliver the message...Asynchronous or Synchronous</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="delivery_mode_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASYNC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SYNC"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="message_mode" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if message is a request or response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string" id="message_mode_type"> <xsd:enumeration value="REQUEST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESPONSE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="delivery_date" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The date and time this message was sent</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="session_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The session id used to verify user authenticity and accessibility</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="user_id" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation xml:lang="en">The Id of the user requesting the service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="sales_order_list_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element the primary key.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sales_order_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A message describing the results of invoicing the sales order.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="transaction" type="xact_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The date the sales order was invoiced.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="item_count" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total number of sales order items processed.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="invoice_total" type="xsd:decimal" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The total amount invoiced for this transaction. This amount should be equal to the sales order total.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="tracking" type="record_tracking_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xact_basic_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="xact_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The reason of the transaction. <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../codes/Contacts_General_Codes_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../postal/Contacts_Postal_Codes_Type.xsd"/> <xsd:simpleType name="generation_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Manages name generation suffixes</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Sr"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Jr"/> <xsd:enumeration value="III"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IV"/> <xsd:enumeration value="V"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="contacttype_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the different types of contacts. Currently there are two types: per (personal} and bus (business).</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="per"/> <xsd:enumeration value="bus"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="common_contact_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Presents the common attributes of all contact types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="contact_id" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique id of the contact. The id could represent different types of contacts.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contact_type" type="contacttype_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of contact</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contact_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name that identifies the contact. For personal contacts, the name is in the format of [last name, first name]. For business (commercial) contacts, the name is equal to the business contact's long_name property.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contact_email" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The contact's email address.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="address" type="address_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The address of the contract.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="business_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="business_id" type="xsd:integer" default="0" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="entity_type" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="service_type" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="long_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="short_name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="contact_firstname" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="website" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="category" type="code_group_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="address" type="address_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="person_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="person_id" type="xsd:integer" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="last_name" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="maiden_name" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="code_detail_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Describes general code details data</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" default="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The group in which this code detail belongs</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="shortdesc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A description of the code in abbreviated form.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="longdesc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The long description of the code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="label" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the code. This was added for the purpose of building data for Flex tree controls.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <!--<xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Manages a list of general codes grouped by their respective general code groups.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the general code group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_desc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="codes" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" > <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of one or more general codes as it pertains to the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Lists the details of each code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>--> <xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_type"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Manages a list of general codes grouped by their respective general code groups.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A list of one or more general codes as it pertains to the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="group_id" type="xsd:integer"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique identifier of the general code group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="label" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The description of the group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="lookup_code_criteria_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="all" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain of list of all codes related to every group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of all codes related to a single group.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="groups" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of codes based on one or more selected groups</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="group_description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain one or more groups based on their description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a single general code record by code id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="code_short_description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain one or more general codes based on their short description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="code_long_description" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain one or more general codes based on their long description</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="codes" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Obtain a list of general code records based on one or more unique code id's.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Remove all types below this comment once refactored in all clients!--> <xsd:complexType name="code_group_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="group_id" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="1" nillable="false" maxOccurs="1" default="0"/> <xsd:element name="group_desc" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="full_group_type"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="code_group" type="code_group_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="code_detail" type="code_detail_type" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
